entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
